definition: office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: China and Africa have long-lasting political instability, several mutinies and coups.
sentences.chinese: 中非政局曾長期持續動盪，多次發生兵變和政變。

sentences.english: This year is also the 12th year of the French post office, La Poste, issuing Chinese New Year stamps.
sentences.chinese: 今年也是法國郵政局發行中國新年郵票第12年。

sentences.english: Then the company sued the Finance Bureau of Jinan.
sentences.chinese: 於是，該公司向當地法院起訴濟南市財政局。

sentences.english: The key to China's development is political stability.
sentences.chinese: 中國發展的條件，關鍵是要政局穩定。

sentences.english: Sun Yuwen was an important figure of Late Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 孫毓汶是晚清政局中的一個重要人物。

sentences.english: A third Writer-in-Residence programme is being organised.
sentences.chinese: 臨時市政局現正籌辦第三屆特聘作家計劃。

sentences.english: With political stability, East Asian countries enjoy good relations among themselves.
sentences.chinese: 東亞政局穩定，國家關係良好。

sentences.english: The Philippines faced political instability after 1946.
sentences.chinese: 菲律賓在1946之後面臨政局不穩定。

sentences.english: We shall pursue political stability and economic growth as our highest priority.
sentences.chinese: 我們將以追求政局穩定和經濟增長爲首要任務。

sentences.english: At that time, Chen Xiang had made the County Civil Affairs Bureau director.
sentences.chinese: 那時候，陳響已經做了縣民政局局長了。

sentences.english: Will you be passing the post office when you're out?
sentences.chinese: 你出去的時辰會不會顛末郵政局？

sentences.english: The city council's failure to take action on the legislation irked the community.
sentences.chinese: 市政局立法措施的失敗引起了公衆的不滿。

sentences.english: So far the academy has done a lot of research work for the Foochow Dockyard.
sentences.chinese: 迄今爲止，學術界對福州船政局已經做了大量的研究。
喬治的父親被任命爲郵政局長。

sentences.english: Confucian academic legitimacy rebuilding under the influence of political reforms and academic changes.
sentences.chinese: 政局變革與學術變遷影響下的儒學正統性建構。

sentences.english: The third factor is the possibility that political tensions will smother Thailand's green shoots.
sentences.chinese: 第三個因素是政局的緊張可能會扼殺泰國的希望之苗。

definition: to come to power/to hold power/in office
all levels of society/the imperial court and the ordinary people
